statements: SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data
SELECT device_id, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE anomaly_detected = TRUE
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT device_id, timestamp, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_consumed > 1000
SELECT AVG(energy_consumed) as average_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND anomaly_detected = true;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE device_id = '531c8f9e-11dc-4c78-a15a-b199f3ad96cd' ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, energy_consumed, anomaly_detected FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY device_id ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_consumed > 100;
SELECT * FROM anomalies_detected WHERE anomaly_type = 'high_voltage';
SELECT AVG(energy_consumed) AS avg_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS total_anomalies FROM anomalies_detected GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE device_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC, device_id ASC;
SELECT device_id, AVG(energy_consumed) AS avg_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY device_id HAVING avg_energy_consumed > 50 ORDER BY avg_energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS num_anomalies_detected FROM anomalies_detected WHERE anomaly_type = 'critical' GROUP BY device_id HAVING num_anomalies_detected > 3 ORDER BY device_id ASC;

SELECT device_id, MAX(energy_consumed) AS max_energy_consumed, MIN(energy_consumed) AS min_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE device_id IN (1, 3, 5) GROUP BY device_id ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT energy_consumption, device_id FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_consumption > 100;
SELECT * FROM DeviceLocations WHERE location LIKE '%Office%';
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS total_anomalies FROM AnomaliesDetected GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM AnomaliesDetected WHERE anomaly_description = 'Critical issue' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE device_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, energy_consumption FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE energy_consumption > 100 ORDER BY energy_consumption ASC;
SELECT device_id, location FROM DeviceLocations WHERE location LIKE '%Building%' ORDER BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM AnomaliesDetected WHERE anomaly_id BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000 ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(anomaly_id) AS total_anomalies FROM AnomaliesDetected GROUP BY device_id HAVING total_anomalies > 5 ORDER BY total_anomalies DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM device_details WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, anomaly_type FROM anomaly_log WHERE anomaly_type = 'critical' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM efficiency_report WHERE efficiency_score > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE device_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, location FROM device_details WHERE device_name LIKE 'AC%';
SELECT device_id, anomaly_type FROM anomaly_log WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, MAX(energy_consumed) AS max_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, AVG(efficiency_score) AS avg_efficiency_score FROM efficiency_report WHERE efficiency_score > 0.7;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data
SELECT device_id, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC
SELECT device_name, location FROM device_details WHERE location='Living Room'
SELECT anomaly_id, device_id, anomaly_type FROM anomalies_detected WHERE device_id = 101
SELECT log_entry, timestamp FROM anomaly_logs
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT device_id, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_consumed > 100;

SELECT device_details.device_name, device_details.location, anomalies_detected.anomaly_type FROM device_details INNER JOIN anomalies_detected ON device_details.device_id = anomalies_detected.device_id;
SELECT * FROM inefficient_devices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_details.device_name, anomaly_logs.log_entry FROM device_details LEFT JOIN anomaly_logs ON device_details.device_id = anomaly_logs.anomaly_id;
